name: List
title: Google
Cloud
Pubsub
Snapshot
List
description: Snapshot::List is a special case Array with additional values.

methods.name: token
title: Google
Cloud
Pubsub
Snapshot
List#token
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more snapshots that match the request and this value should be passed to the next Google::Cloud::Pubsub::Project#snapshots to continue.

methods.name: token=
title: Google
Cloud
Pubsub
Snapshot
List#token=
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more snapshots that match the request and this value should be passed to the next Google::Cloud::Pubsub::Project#snapshots to continue.

methods.name: next?
title: Google
Cloud
Pubsub
Snapshot
List#next?
methods.description: Whether there a next page of snapshots.

examples.code:
require "google/cloud/pubsub"

pubsub = Google::Cloud::Pubsub.new

snapshots = pubsub.snapshots
if snapshots.next?
  next_snapshots = snapshots.next
end

require "google/cloud/pubsub"

pubsub = Google::Cloud::Pubsub.new

snapshots = pubsub.snapshots
if snapshots.next?
  next_snapshots = snapshots.next
end

methods.name: all
title: Google
Cloud
Pubsub
Snapshot
List#all
methods.description:
Retrieves remaining results by repeatedly invoking #next until #next? returns false. Calls the given block once for each result, which is passed as the argument to the block.

An Enumerator is returned if no block is given.

This method will make repeated API calls until all remaining results are retrieved. (Unlike #each, for example, which merely iterates over the results returned by a single API call.) Use with caution.

examples.caption: Iterating each snapshot by passing a block:
examples.code:
require "google/cloud/pubsub"

pubsub = Google::Cloud::Pubsub.new

snapshots = pubsub.snapshots
snapshots.all do |snapshot|
  puts snapshot.name
end

examples.caption: Using the enumerator by not passing a block:
examples.code:
require "google/cloud/pubsub"

pubsub = Google::Cloud::Pubsub.new

snapshots = pubsub.snapshots
all_names = snapshots.all.map do |snapshot|
  snapshot.name
end

examples.caption: Limit the number of API calls made:
examples.code:
require "google/cloud/pubsub"

pubsub = Google::Cloud::Pubsub.new

snapshots = pubsub.snapshots
snapshots.all(request_limit: 10) do |snapshot|
  puts snapshot.name
end

params.name: request_limit
params.description:
The upper limit of API requests to
make to load all snapshots. Default is no limit.

params.name: yield
params.description: The block for accessing each snapshot.
